3224  /**
3225   * This structure steps restores one instance + positions of one block
3226   * Note: Positions corresponding to one existing context are restored
3227   * here, but all the ones having unknown contexts are sent to backup_ids
3228   * for a later chance to be restored at the end (final task)
3229   */
3230  class restore_block_instance_structure_step extends restore_structure_step {
3231  
3232      protected function define_structure() {
3233  
3234          $paths = array();
3235  
3236          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('block', '/block', true); // Get the whole XML together
3237          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('block_position', '/block/block_positions/block_position');
3238  
3239          return $paths;
3240      }
3241  
3242      public function process_block($data) {
3243          global $DB, $CFG;
3244  
3245          $data = (object)$data; // Handy
3246          $oldcontextid = $data->contextid;
3247          $oldid        = $data->id;
3248          $positions = isset($data->block_positions['block_position']) ? $data->block_positions['block_position'] : array();
3249  
3250          // Look for the parent contextid
3251          if (!$data->parentcontextid = $this->get_mappingid('context', $data->parentcontextid)) {
3252              throw new restore_step_exception('restore_block_missing_parent_ctx', $data->parentcontextid);
3253          }
3254  
3255          // TODO: it would be nice to use standard plugin supports instead of this instance_allow_multiple()
3256          // If there is already one block of that type in the parent context
3257          // and the block is not multiple, stop processing
3258          // Use blockslib loader / method executor
3259          if (!$bi = block_instance($data->blockname)) {
3260              return false;
3261          }
3262  
3263          if (!$bi->instance_allow_multiple()) {
3264              // The block cannot be added twice, so we will check if the same block is already being
3265              // displayed on the same page. For this, rather than mocking a page and using the block_manager
3266              // we use a similar query to the one in block_manager::load_blocks(), this will give us
3267              // a very good idea of the blocks already displayed in the context.
3268              $params =  array(
3269                  'blockname' => $data->blockname
3270              );
3271  
3272              // Context matching test.
3273              $context = context::instance_by_id($data->parentcontextid);
3274              $contextsql = 'bi.parentcontextid = :contextid';
3275              $params['contextid'] = $context->id;
3276  
3277              $parentcontextids = $context->get_parent_context_ids();
3278              if ($parentcontextids) {
3279                  list($parentcontextsql, $parentcontextparams) =
3280                          $DB->get_in_or_equal($parentcontextids, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED);
3281                  $contextsql = "($contextsql OR (bi.showinsubcontexts = 1 AND bi.parentcontextid $parentcontextsql))";
3282                  $params = array_merge($params, $parentcontextparams);
3283              }
3284  
3285              // Page type pattern test.
3286              $pagetypepatterns = matching_page_type_patterns_from_pattern($data->pagetypepattern);
3287              list($pagetypepatternsql, $pagetypepatternparams) =
3288                  $DB->get_in_or_equal($pagetypepatterns, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED);
3289              $params = array_merge($params, $pagetypepatternparams);
3290  
3291              // Sub page pattern test.
3292              $subpagepatternsql = 'bi.subpagepattern IS NULL';
3293              if ($data->subpagepattern !== null) {
3294                  $subpagepatternsql = "($subpagepatternsql OR bi.subpagepattern = :subpagepattern)";
3295                  $params['subpagepattern'] = $data->subpagepattern;
3296              }
3297  
3298              $exists = $DB->record_exists_sql("SELECT bi.id
3299                                                  FROM {block_instances} bi
3300                                                  JOIN {block} b ON b.name = bi.blockname
3301                                                 WHERE bi.blockname = :blockname
3302                                                   AND $contextsql
3303                                                   AND bi.pagetypepattern $pagetypepatternsql
3304                                                   AND $subpagepatternsql", $params);
3305              if ($exists) {
3306                  // There is at least one very similar block visible on the page where we
3307                  // are trying to restore the block. In these circumstances the block API
3308                  // would not allow the user to add another instance of the block, so we
3309                  // apply the same rule here.
3310                  return false;
3311              }
3312          }
3313  
3314          // If there is already one block of that type in the parent context
3315          // with the same showincontexts, pagetypepattern, subpagepattern, defaultregion and configdata
3316          // stop processing
3317          $params = array(
3318              'blockname' => $data->blockname, 'parentcontextid' => $data->parentcontextid,
3319              'showinsubcontexts' => $data->showinsubcontexts, 'pagetypepattern' => $data->pagetypepattern,
3320              'subpagepattern' => $data->subpagepattern, 'defaultregion' => $data->defaultregion);
3321          if ($birecs = $DB->get_records('block_instances', $params)) {
3322              foreach($birecs as $birec) {
3323                  if ($birec->configdata == $data->configdata) {
3324                      return false;
3325                  }
3326              }
3327          }
3328  
3329          // Set task old contextid, blockid and blockname once we know them
3330          $this->task->set_old_contextid($oldcontextid);
3331          $this->task->set_old_blockid($oldid);
3332          $this->task->set_blockname($data->blockname);
3333  
3334          // Let's look for anything within configdata neededing processing
3335          // (nulls and uses of legacy file.php)
3336          if ($attrstotransform = $this->task->get_configdata_encoded_attributes()) {
3337              $configdata = (array)unserialize(base64_decode($data->configdata));
3338              foreach ($configdata as $attribute => $value) {
3339                  if (in_array($attribute, $attrstotransform)) {
3340                      $configdata[$attribute] = $this->contentprocessor->process_cdata($value);
3341                  }
3342              }
3343              $data->configdata = base64_encode(serialize((object)$configdata));
3344          }
3345  
3346          // Create the block instance
3347          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('block_instances', $data);
3348          // Save the mapping (with restorefiles support)
3349          $this->set_mapping('block_instance', $oldid, $newitemid, true);
3350          // Create the block context
3351          $newcontextid = context_block::instance($newitemid)->id;
3352          // Save the block contexts mapping and sent it to task
3353          $this->set_mapping('context', $oldcontextid, $newcontextid);
3354          $this->task->set_contextid($newcontextid);
3355          $this->task->set_blockid($newitemid);
3356  
3357          // Restore block fileareas if declared
3358          $component = 'block_' . $this->task->get_blockname();
3359          foreach ($this->task->get_fileareas() as $filearea) { // Simple match by contextid. No itemname needed
3360              $this->add_related_files($component, $filearea, null);
3361          }
3362  
3363          // Process block positions, creating them or accumulating for final step
3364          foreach($positions as $position) {
3365              $position = (object)$position;
3366              $position->blockinstanceid = $newitemid; // The instance is always the restored one
3367              // If position is for one already mapped (known) contextid
3368              // process it now, creating the position
3369              if ($newpositionctxid = $this->get_mappingid('context', $position->contextid)) {
3370                  $position->contextid = $newpositionctxid;
3371                  // Create the block position
3372                  $DB->insert_record('block_positions', $position);
3373  
3374              // The position belongs to an unknown context, send it to backup_ids
3375              // to process them as part of the final steps of restore. We send the
3376              // whole $position object there, hence use the low level method.
3377              } else {
3378                  restore_dbops::set_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(), 'block_position', $position->id, 0, null, $position);
3379              }
3380          }
3381      }
3382  }

3384  /**
3385   * Structure step to restore common course_module information
3386   *
3387   * This step will process the module.xml file for one activity, in order to restore
3388   * the corresponding information to the course_modules table, skipping various bits
3389   * of information based on CFG settings (groupings, completion...) in order to fullfill
3390   * all the reqs to be able to create the context to be used by all the rest of steps
3391   * in the activity restore task
3392   */
3393  class restore_module_structure_step extends restore_structure_step {
3394  
3395      protected function define_structure() {
3396          global $CFG;
3397  
3398          $paths = array();
3399  
3400          $module = new restore_path_element('module', '/module');
3401          $paths[] = $module;
3402          if ($CFG->enableavailability) {
3403              $paths[] = new restore_path_element('availability', '/module/availability_info/availability');
3404              $paths[] = new restore_path_element('availability_field', '/module/availability_info/availability_field');
3405          }
3406  
3407          // Apply for 'format' plugins optional paths at module level
3408          $this->add_plugin_structure('format', $module);
3409  
3410          // Apply for 'plagiarism' plugins optional paths at module level
3411          $this->add_plugin_structure('plagiarism', $module);
3412  
3413          // Apply for 'local' plugins optional paths at module level
3414          $this->add_plugin_structure('local', $module);
3415  
3416          return $paths;
3417      }
3418  
3419      protected function process_module($data) {
3420          global $CFG, $DB;
3421  
3422          $data = (object)$data;
3423          $oldid = $data->id;
3424          $this->task->set_old_moduleversion($data->version);
3425  
3426          $data->course = $this->task->get_courseid();
3427          $data->module = $DB->get_field('modules', 'id', array('name' => $data->modulename));
3428          // Map section (first try by course_section mapping match. Useful in course and section restores)
3429          $data->section = $this->get_mappingid('course_section', $data->sectionid);
3430          if (!$data->section) { // mapping failed, try to get section by sectionnumber matching
3431              $params = array(
3432                  'course' => $this->get_courseid(),
3433                  'section' => $data->sectionnumber);
3434              $data->section = $DB->get_field('course_sections', 'id', $params);
3435          }
3436          if (!$data->section) { // sectionnumber failed, try to get first section in course
3437              $params = array(
3438                  'course' => $this->get_courseid());
3439              $data->section = $DB->get_field('course_sections', 'MIN(id)', $params);
3440          }
3441          if (!$data->section) { // no sections in course, create section 0 and 1 and assign module to 1
3442              $sectionrec = array(
3443                  'course' => $this->get_courseid(),
3444                  'section' => 0);
3445              $DB->insert_record('course_sections', $sectionrec); // section 0
3446              $sectionrec = array(
3447                  'course' => $this->get_courseid(),
3448                  'section' => 1);
3449              $data->section = $DB->insert_record('course_sections', $sectionrec); // section 1
3450          }
3451          $data->groupingid= $this->get_mappingid('grouping', $data->groupingid);      // grouping
3452          if (!grade_verify_idnumber($data->idnumber, $this->get_courseid())) {        // idnumber uniqueness
3453              $data->idnumber = '';
3454          }
3455          if (empty($CFG->enablecompletion)) { // completion
3456              $data->completion = 0;
3457              $data->completiongradeitemnumber = null;
3458              $data->completionview = 0;
3459              $data->completionexpected = 0;
3460          } else {
3461              $data->completionexpected = $this->apply_date_offset($data->completionexpected);
3462          }
3463          if (empty($CFG->enableavailability)) {
3464              $data->availability = null;
3465          }
3466          // Backups that did not include showdescription, set it to default 0
3467          // (this is not totally necessary as it has a db default, but just to
3468          // be explicit).
3469          if (!isset($data->showdescription)) {
3470              $data->showdescription = 0;
3471          }
3472          $data->instance = 0; // Set to 0 for now, going to create it soon (next step)
3473  
3474          if (empty($data->availability)) {
3475              // If there are legacy availablility data fields (and no new format data),
3476              // convert the old fields.
3477              $data->availability = \core_availability\info::convert_legacy_fields(
3478                      $data, false);
3479          } else if (!empty($data->groupmembersonly)) {
3480              // There is current availability data, but it still has groupmembersonly
3481              // as well (2.7 backups), convert just that part.
3482              require_once($CFG->dirroot . '/lib/db/upgradelib.php');
3483              $data->availability = upgrade_group_members_only($data->groupingid, $data->availability);
3484          }
3485  
3486          // course_module record ready, insert it
3487          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('course_modules', $data);
3488          // save mapping
3489          $this->set_mapping('course_module', $oldid, $newitemid);
3490          // set the new course_module id in the task
3491          $this->task->set_moduleid($newitemid);
3492          // we can now create the context safely
3493          $ctxid = context_module::instance($newitemid)->id;
3494          // set the new context id in the task
3495          $this->task->set_contextid($ctxid);
3496          // update sequence field in course_section
3497          if ($sequence = $DB->get_field('course_sections', 'sequence', array('id' => $data->section))) {
3498              $sequence .= ',' . $newitemid;
3499          } else {
3500              $sequence = $newitemid;
3501          }
3502          $DB->set_field('course_sections', 'sequence', $sequence, array('id' => $data->section));
3503  
3504          // If there is the legacy showavailability data, store this for later use.
3505          // (This data is not present when restoring 'new' backups.)
3506          if (isset($data->showavailability)) {
3507              // Cache the showavailability flag using the backup_ids data field.
3508              restore_dbops::set_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(),
3509                      'module_showavailability', $newitemid, 0, null,
3510                      (object)array('showavailability' => $data->showavailability));
3511          }
3512      }
3513  
3514      /**
3515       * Process the legacy availability table record. This table does not exist
3516       * in Moodle 2.7+ but we still support restore.
3517       *
3518       * @param stdClass $data Record data
3519       */
3520      protected function process_availability($data) {
3521          $data = (object)$data;
3522          // Simply going to store the whole availability record now, we'll process
3523          // all them later in the final task (once all activities have been restored)
3524          // Let's call the low level one to be able to store the whole object
3525          $data->coursemoduleid = $this->task->get_moduleid(); // Let add the availability cmid
3526          restore_dbops::set_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(), 'module_availability', $data->id, 0, null, $data);
3527      }
3528  
3529      /**
3530       * Process the legacy availability fields table record. This table does not
3531       * exist in Moodle 2.7+ but we still support restore.
3532       *
3533       * @param stdClass $data Record data
3534       */
3535      protected function process_availability_field($data) {
3536          global $DB;
3537          $data = (object)$data;
3538          // Mark it is as passed by default
3539          $passed = true;
3540          $customfieldid = null;
3541  
3542          // If a customfield has been used in order to pass we must be able to match an existing
3543          // customfield by name (data->customfield) and type (data->customfieldtype)
3544          if (!empty($data->customfield) xor !empty($data->customfieldtype)) {
3545              // xor is sort of uncommon. If either customfield is null or customfieldtype is null BUT not both.
3546              // If one is null but the other isn't something clearly went wrong and we'll skip this condition.
3547              $passed = false;
3548          } else if (!empty($data->customfield)) {
3549              $params = array('shortname' => $data->customfield, 'datatype' => $data->customfieldtype);
3550              $customfieldid = $DB->get_field('user_info_field', 'id', $params);
3551              $passed = ($customfieldid !== false);
3552          }
3553  
3554          if ($passed) {
3555              // Create the object to insert into the database
3556              $availfield = new stdClass();
3557              $availfield->coursemoduleid = $this->task->get_moduleid(); // Lets add the availability cmid
3558              $availfield->userfield = $data->userfield;
3559              $availfield->customfieldid = $customfieldid;
3560              $availfield->operator = $data->operator;
3561              $availfield->value = $data->value;
3562  
3563              // Get showavailability option.
3564              $showrec = restore_dbops::get_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(),
3565                      'module_showavailability', $availfield->coursemoduleid);
3566              if (!$showrec) {
3567                  // Should not happen.
3568                  throw new coding_exception('No matching showavailability record');
3569              }
3570              $show = $showrec->info->showavailability;
3571  
3572              // The $availfieldobject is now in the format used in the old
3573              // system. Interpret this and convert to new system.
3574              $currentvalue = $DB->get_field('course_modules', 'availability',
3575                      array('id' => $availfield->coursemoduleid), MUST_EXIST);
3576              $newvalue = \core_availability\info::add_legacy_availability_field_condition(
3577                      $currentvalue, $availfield, $show);
3578              $DB->set_field('course_modules', 'availability', $newvalue,
3579                      array('id' => $availfield->coursemoduleid));
3580          }
3581      }
3582  }
3583  
3584  /**
3585   * Structure step that will process the user activity completion
3586   * information if all these conditions are met:
3587   *  - Target site has completion enabled ($CFG->enablecompletion)
3588   *  - Activity includes completion info (file_exists)
3589   */
3590  class restore_userscompletion_structure_step extends restore_structure_step {
3591      /**
3592       * To conditionally decide if this step must be executed
3593       * Note the "settings" conditions are evaluated in the
3594       * corresponding task. Here we check for other conditions
3595       * not being restore settings (files, site settings...)
3596       */
3597       protected function execute_condition() {
3598           global $CFG;
3599  
3600           // Completion disabled in this site, don't execute
3601           if (empty($CFG->enablecompletion)) {
3602               return false;
3603           }
3604  
3605          // No completion on the front page.
3606          if ($this->get_courseid() == SITEID) {
3607              return false;
3608          }
3609  
3610           // No user completion info found, don't execute
3611          $fullpath = $this->task->get_taskbasepath();
3612          $fullpath = rtrim($fullpath, '/') . '/' . $this->filename;
3613           if (!file_exists($fullpath)) {
3614               return false;
3615           }
3616  
3617           // Arrived here, execute the step
3618           return true;
3619       }
3620  
3621       protected function define_structure() {
3622  
3623          $paths = array();
3624  
3625          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('completion', '/completions/completion');
3626  
3627          return $paths;
3628      }
3629  
3630      protected function process_completion($data) {
3631          global $DB;
3632  
3633          $data = (object)$data;
3634  
3635          $data->coursemoduleid = $this->task->get_moduleid();
3636          $data->userid = $this->get_mappingid('user', $data->userid);
3637          $data->timemodified = $this->apply_date_offset($data->timemodified);
3638  
3639          // Find the existing record
3640          $existing = $DB->get_record('course_modules_completion', array(
3641                  'coursemoduleid' => $data->coursemoduleid,
3642                  'userid' => $data->userid), 'id, timemodified');
3643          // Check we didn't already insert one for this cmid and userid
3644          // (there aren't supposed to be duplicates in that field, but
3645          // it was possible until MDL-28021 was fixed).
3646          if ($existing) {
3647              // Update it to these new values, but only if the time is newer
3648              if ($existing->timemodified < $data->timemodified) {
3649                  $data->id = $existing->id;
3650                  $DB->update_record('course_modules_completion', $data);
3651              }
3652          } else {
3653              // Normal entry where it doesn't exist already
3654              $DB->insert_record('course_modules_completion', $data);
3655          }
3656      }
3657  }
3658  
3659  /**
3660   * Abstract structure step, parent of all the activity structure steps. Used to suuport
3661   * the main <activity ...> tag and process it. Also provides subplugin support for
3662   * activities.
3663   */
3664  abstract class restore_activity_structure_step extends restore_structure_step {
3665  
3666      protected function add_subplugin_structure($subplugintype, $element) {
3667  
3668          global $CFG;
3669  
3670          // Check the requested subplugintype is a valid one
3671          $subpluginsfile = $CFG->dirroot . '/mod/' . $this->task->get_modulename() . '/db/subplugins.php';
3672          if (!file_exists($subpluginsfile)) {
3673               throw new restore_step_exception('activity_missing_subplugins_php_file', $this->task->get_modulename());
3674          }
3675          include($subpluginsfile);
3676          if (!array_key_exists($subplugintype, $subplugins)) {
3677               throw new restore_step_exception('incorrect_subplugin_type', $subplugintype);
3678          }
3679          // Get all the restore path elements, looking across all the subplugin dirs
3680          $subpluginsdirs = core_component::get_plugin_list($subplugintype);
3681          foreach ($subpluginsdirs as $name => $subpluginsdir) {
3682              $classname = 'restore_' . $subplugintype . '_' . $name . '_subplugin';
3683              $restorefile = $subpluginsdir . '/backup/moodle2/' . $classname . '.class.php';
3684              if (file_exists($restorefile)) {
3685                  require_once($restorefile);
3686                  $restoresubplugin = new $classname($subplugintype, $name, $this);
3687                  // Add subplugin paths to the step
3688                  $this->prepare_pathelements($restoresubplugin->define_subplugin_structure($element));
3689              }
3690          }
3691      }
3692  
3693      /**
3694       * As far as activity restore steps are implementing restore_subplugin stuff, they need to
3695       * have the parent task available for wrapping purposes (get course/context....)
3696       * @return restore_task
3697       */
3698      public function get_task() {
3699          return $this->task;
3700      }
3701  
3702      /**
3703       * Adds support for the 'activity' path that is common to all the activities
3704       * and will be processed globally here
3705       */
3706      protected function prepare_activity_structure($paths) {
3707  
3708          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('activity', '/activity');
3709  
3710          return $paths;
3711      }
3712  
3713      /**
3714       * Process the activity path, informing the task about various ids, needed later
3715       */
3716      protected function process_activity($data) {
3717          $data = (object)$data;
3718          $this->task->set_old_contextid($data->contextid); // Save old contextid in task
3719          $this->set_mapping('context', $data->contextid, $this->task->get_contextid()); // Set the mapping
3720          $this->task->set_old_activityid($data->id); // Save old activityid in task
3721      }
3722  
3723      /**
3724       * This must be invoked immediately after creating the "module" activity record (forum, choice...)
3725       * and will adjust the new activity id (the instance) in various places
3726       */
3727      protected function apply_activity_instance($newitemid) {
3728          global $DB;
3729  
3730          $this->task->set_activityid($newitemid); // Save activity id in task
3731          // Apply the id to course_sections->instanceid
3732          $DB->set_field('course_modules', 'instance', $newitemid, array('id' => $this->task->get_moduleid()));
3733          // Do the mapping for modulename, preparing it for files by oldcontext
3734          $modulename = $this->task->get_modulename();
3735          $oldid = $this->task->get_old_activityid();
3736          $this->set_mapping($modulename, $oldid, $newitemid, true);
3737      }
3738  }
3739  
3740  /**
3741   * Structure step in charge of creating/mapping all the qcats and qs
3742   * by parsing the questions.xml file and checking it against the
3743   * results calculated by {@link restore_process_categories_and_questions}
3744   * and stored in backup_ids_temp
3745   */
3746  class restore_create_categories_and_questions extends restore_structure_step {
3747  
3748      /** @var array $cachecategory store a question category */
3749      protected $cachedcategory = null;
3750  
3751      protected function define_structure() {
3752  
3753          $category = new restore_path_element('question_category', '/question_categories/question_category');
3754          $question = new restore_path_element('question', '/question_categories/question_category/questions/question');
3755          $hint = new restore_path_element('question_hint',
3756                  '/question_categories/question_category/questions/question/question_hints/question_hint');
3757  
3758          $tag = new restore_path_element('tag','/question_categories/question_category/questions/question/tags/tag');
3759  
3760          // Apply for 'qtype' plugins optional paths at question level
3761          $this->add_plugin_structure('qtype', $question);
3762  
3763          // Apply for 'local' plugins optional paths at question level
3764          $this->add_plugin_structure('local', $question);
3765  
3766          return array($category, $question, $hint, $tag);
3767      }
3768  
3769      protected function process_question_category($data) {
3770          global $DB;
3771  
3772          $data = (object)$data;
3773          $oldid = $data->id;
3774  
3775          // Check we have one mapping for this category
3776          if (!$mapping = $this->get_mapping('question_category', $oldid)) {
3777              return self::SKIP_ALL_CHILDREN; // No mapping = this category doesn't need to be created/mapped
3778          }
3779  
3780          // Check we have to create the category (newitemid = 0)
3781          if ($mapping->newitemid) {
3782              return; // newitemid != 0, this category is going to be mapped. Nothing to do
3783          }
3784  
3785          // Arrived here, newitemid = 0, we need to create the category
3786          // we'll do it at parentitemid context, but for CONTEXT_MODULE
3787          // categories, that will be created at CONTEXT_COURSE and moved
3788          // to module context later when the activity is created
3789          if ($mapping->info->contextlevel == CONTEXT_MODULE) {
3790              $mapping->parentitemid = $this->get_mappingid('context', $this->task->get_old_contextid());
3791          }
3792          $data->contextid = $mapping->parentitemid;
3793  
3794          // Let's create the question_category and save mapping
3795          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question_categories', $data);
3796          $this->set_mapping('question_category', $oldid, $newitemid);
3797          // Also annotate them as question_category_created, we need
3798          // that later when remapping parents
3799          $this->set_mapping('question_category_created', $oldid, $newitemid, false, null, $data->contextid);
3800      }
3801  
3802      protected function process_question($data) {
3803          global $DB;
3804  
3805          $data = (object)$data;
3806          $oldid = $data->id;
3807  
3808          // Check we have one mapping for this question
3809          if (!$questionmapping = $this->get_mapping('question', $oldid)) {
3810              return; // No mapping = this question doesn't need to be created/mapped
3811          }
3812  
3813          // Get the mapped category (cannot use get_new_parentid() because not
3814          // all the categories have been created, so it is not always available
3815          // Instead we get the mapping for the question->parentitemid because
3816          // we have loaded qcatids there for all parsed questions
3817          $data->category = $this->get_mappingid('question_category', $questionmapping->parentitemid);
3818  
3819          // In the past, there were some very sloppy values of penalty. Fix them.
3820          if ($data->penalty >= 0.33 && $data->penalty <= 0.34) {
3821              $data->penalty = 0.3333333;
3822          }
3823          if ($data->penalty >= 0.66 && $data->penalty <= 0.67) {
3824              $data->penalty = 0.6666667;
3825          }
3826          if ($data->penalty >= 1) {
3827              $data->penalty = 1;
3828          }
3829  
3830          $userid = $this->get_mappingid('user', $data->createdby);
3831          $data->createdby = $userid ? $userid : $this->task->get_userid();
3832  
3833          $userid = $this->get_mappingid('user', $data->modifiedby);
3834          $data->modifiedby = $userid ? $userid : $this->task->get_userid();
3835  
3836          // With newitemid = 0, let's create the question
3837          if (!$questionmapping->newitemid) {
3838              $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question', $data);
3839              $this->set_mapping('question', $oldid, $newitemid);
3840              // Also annotate them as question_created, we need
3841              // that later when remapping parents (keeping the old categoryid as parentid)
3842              $this->set_mapping('question_created', $oldid, $newitemid, false, null, $questionmapping->parentitemid);
3843          } else {
3844              // By performing this set_mapping() we make get_old/new_parentid() to work for all the
3845              // children elements of the 'question' one (so qtype plugins will know the question they belong to)
3846              $this->set_mapping('question', $oldid, $questionmapping->newitemid);
3847          }
3848  
3849          // Note, we don't restore any question files yet
3850          // as far as the CONTEXT_MODULE categories still
3851          // haven't their contexts to be restored to
3852          // The {@link restore_create_question_files}, executed in the final step
3853          // step will be in charge of restoring all the question files
3854      }
3855  
3856      protected function process_question_hint($data) {
3857          global $DB;
3858  
3859          $data = (object)$data;
3860          $oldid = $data->id;
3861  
3862          // Detect if the question is created or mapped
3863          $oldquestionid   = $this->get_old_parentid('question');
3864          $newquestionid   = $this->get_new_parentid('question');
3865          $questioncreated = $this->get_mappingid('question_created', $oldquestionid) ? true : false;
3866  
3867          // If the question has been created by restore, we need to create its question_answers too
3868          if ($questioncreated) {
3869              // Adjust some columns
3870              $data->questionid = $newquestionid;
3871              // Insert record
3872              $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question_hints', $data);
3873  
3874          // The question existed, we need to map the existing question_hints
3875          } else {
3876              // Look in question_hints by hint text matching
3877              $sql = 'SELECT id
3878                        FROM {question_hints}
3879                       WHERE questionid = ?
3880                         AND ' . $DB->sql_compare_text('hint', 255) . ' = ' . $DB->sql_compare_text('?', 255);
3881              $params = array($newquestionid, $data->hint);
3882              $newitemid = $DB->get_field_sql($sql, $params);
3883  
3884              // Not able to find the hint, let's try cleaning the hint text
3885              // of all the question's hints in DB as slower fallback. MDL-33863.
3886              if (!$newitemid) {
3887                  $potentialhints = $DB->get_records('question_hints',
3888                          array('questionid' => $newquestionid), '', 'id, hint');
3889                  foreach ($potentialhints as $potentialhint) {
3890                      // Clean in the same way than {@link xml_writer::xml_safe_utf8()}.
3891                      $cleanhint = preg_replace('/[\x-\x8\xb-\xc\xe-\x1f\x7f]/is','', $potentialhint->hint); // Clean CTRL chars.
3892                      $cleanhint = preg_replace("/\r\n|\r/", "\n", $cleanhint); // Normalize line ending.
3893                      if ($cleanhint === $data->hint) {
3894                          $newitemid = $data->id;
3895                      }
3896                  }
3897              }
3898  
3899              // If we haven't found the newitemid, something has gone really wrong, question in DB
3900              // is missing hints, exception
3901              if (!$newitemid) {
3902                  $info = new stdClass();
3903                  $info->filequestionid = $oldquestionid;
3904                  $info->dbquestionid   = $newquestionid;
3905                  $info->hint           = $data->hint;
3906                  throw new restore_step_exception('error_question_hint_missing_in_db', $info);
3907              }
3908          }
3909          // Create mapping (I'm not sure if this is really needed?)
3910          $this->set_mapping('question_hint', $oldid, $newitemid);
3911      }
3912  
3913      protected function process_tag($data) {
3914          global $CFG, $DB;
3915  
3916          $data = (object)$data;
3917          $newquestion = $this->get_new_parentid('question');
3918          $questioncreated = (bool) $this->get_mappingid('question_created', $this->get_old_parentid('question'));
3919          if (!$questioncreated) {
3920              // This question already exists in the question bank. Nothing for us to do.
3921              return;
3922          }
3923  
3924          if (!empty($CFG->usetags)) { // if enabled in server
3925              // TODO: This is highly inefficient. Each time we add one tag
3926              // we fetch all the existing because tag_set() deletes them
3927              // so everything must be reinserted on each call
3928              $tags = array();
3929              $existingtags = tag_get_tags('question', $newquestion);
3930              // Re-add all the existitng tags
3931              foreach ($existingtags as $existingtag) {
3932                  $tags[] = $existingtag->rawname;
3933              }
3934              // Add the one being restored
3935              $tags[] = $data->rawname;
3936              // Get the category, so we can then later get the context.
3937              $categoryid = $this->get_new_parentid('question_category');
3938              if (empty($this->cachedcategory) || $this->cachedcategory->id != $categoryid) {
3939                  $this->cachedcategory = $DB->get_record('question_categories', array('id' => $categoryid));
3940              }
3941              // Send all the tags back to the question
3942              tag_set('question', $newquestion, $tags, 'core_question', $this->cachedcategory->contextid);
3943          }
3944      }
3945  
3946      protected function after_execute() {
3947          global $DB;
3948  
3949          // First of all, recode all the created question_categories->parent fields
3950          $qcats = $DB->get_records('backup_ids_temp', array(
3951                       'backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(),
3952                       'itemname' => 'question_category_created'));
3953          foreach ($qcats as $qcat) {
3954              $newparent = 0;
3955              $dbcat = $DB->get_record('question_categories', array('id' => $qcat->newitemid));
3956              // Get new parent (mapped or created, so we look in quesiton_category mappings)
3957              if ($newparent = $DB->get_field('backup_ids_temp', 'newitemid', array(
3958                                   'backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(),
3959                                   'itemname' => 'question_category',
3960                                   'itemid'   => $dbcat->parent))) {
3961                  // contextids must match always, as far as we always include complete qbanks, just check it
3962                  $newparentctxid = $DB->get_field('question_categories', 'contextid', array('id' => $newparent));
3963                  if ($dbcat->contextid == $newparentctxid) {
3964                      $DB->set_field('question_categories', 'parent', $newparent, array('id' => $dbcat->id));
3965                  } else {
3966                      $newparent = 0; // No ctx match for both cats, no parent relationship
3967                  }
3968              }
3969              // Here with $newparent empty, problem with contexts or remapping, set it to top cat
3970              if (!$newparent) {
3971                  $DB->set_field('question_categories', 'parent', 0, array('id' => $dbcat->id));
3972              }
3973          }
3974  
3975          // Now, recode all the created question->parent fields
3976          $qs = $DB->get_records('backup_ids_temp', array(
3977                    'backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(),
3978                    'itemname' => 'question_created'));
3979          foreach ($qs as $q) {
3980              $newparent = 0;
3981              $dbq = $DB->get_record('question', array('id' => $q->newitemid));
3982              // Get new parent (mapped or created, so we look in question mappings)
3983              if ($newparent = $DB->get_field('backup_ids_temp', 'newitemid', array(
3984                                   'backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(),
3985                                   'itemname' => 'question',
3986                                   'itemid'   => $dbq->parent))) {
3987                  $DB->set_field('question', 'parent', $newparent, array('id' => $dbq->id));
3988              }
3989          }
3990  
3991          // Note, we don't restore any question files yet
3992          // as far as the CONTEXT_MODULE categories still
3993          // haven't their contexts to be restored to
3994          // The {@link restore_create_question_files}, executed in the final step
3995          // step will be in charge of restoring all the question files
3996      }
3997  }
3998  
3999  /**
4000   * Execution step that will move all the CONTEXT_MODULE question categories
4001   * created at early stages of restore in course context (because modules weren't
4002   * created yet) to their target module (matching by old-new-contextid mapping)
4003   */
4004  class restore_move_module_questions_categories extends restore_execution_step {
4005  
4006      protected function define_execution() {
4007          global $DB;
4008  
4009          $contexts = restore_dbops::restore_get_question_banks($this->get_restoreid(), CONTEXT_MODULE);
4010          foreach ($contexts as $contextid => $contextlevel) {
4011              // Only if context mapping exists (i.e. the module has been restored)
4012              if ($newcontext = restore_dbops::get_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(), 'context', $contextid)) {
4013                  // Update all the qcats having their parentitemid set to the original contextid
4014                  $modulecats = $DB->get_records_sql("SELECT itemid, newitemid
4015                                                        FROM {backup_ids_temp}
4016                                                       WHERE backupid = ?
4017                                                         AND itemname = 'question_category'
4018                                                         AND parentitemid = ?", array($this->get_restoreid(), $contextid));
4019                  foreach ($modulecats as $modulecat) {
4020                      $DB->set_field('question_categories', 'contextid', $newcontext->newitemid, array('id' => $modulecat->newitemid));
4021                      // And set new contextid also in question_category mapping (will be
4022                      // used by {@link restore_create_question_files} later
4023                      restore_dbops::set_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(), 'question_category', $modulecat->itemid, $modulecat->newitemid, $newcontext->newitemid);
4024                  }
4025              }
4026          }
4027      }
4028  }
4029  
4030  /**
4031   * Execution step that will create all the question/answers/qtype-specific files for the restored
4032   * questions. It must be executed after {@link restore_move_module_questions_categories}
4033   * because only then each question is in its final category and only then the
4034   * contexts can be determined.
4035   */
4036  class restore_create_question_files extends restore_execution_step {
4037  
4038      /** @var array Question-type specific component items cache. */
4039      private $qtypecomponentscache = array();
4040  
4041      /**
4042       * Preform the restore_create_question_files step.
4043       */
4044      protected function define_execution() {
4045          global $DB;
4046  
4047          // Track progress, as this task can take a long time.
4048          $progress = $this->task->get_progress();
4049          $progress->start_progress($this->get_name(), \core\progress\base::INDETERMINATE);
4050  
4051          // Parentitemids of question_createds in backup_ids_temp are the category it is in.
4052          // MUST use a recordset, as there is no unique key in the first (or any) column.
4053          $catqtypes = $DB->get_recordset_sql("SELECT DISTINCT bi.parentitemid AS categoryid, q.qtype as qtype
4054                                                 FROM {backup_ids_temp} bi
4055                                                 JOIN {question} q ON q.id = bi.newitemid
4056                                                WHERE bi.backupid = ?
4057                                                  AND bi.itemname = 'question_created'
4058                                             ORDER BY categoryid ASC", array($this->get_restoreid()));
4059  
4060          $currentcatid = -1;
4061          foreach ($catqtypes as $categoryid => $row) {
4062              $qtype = $row->qtype;
4063  
4064              // Check if we are in a new category.
4065              if ($currentcatid !== $categoryid) {
4066                  // Report progress for each category.
4067                  $progress->progress();
4068  
4069                  if (!$qcatmapping = restore_dbops::get_backup_ids_record($this->get_restoreid(),
4070                          'question_category', $categoryid)) {
4071                      // Something went really wrong, cannot find the question_category for the question_created records.
4072                      debugging('Error fetching target context for question', DEBUG_DEVELOPER);
4073                      continue;
4074                  }
4075  
4076                  // Calculate source and target contexts.
4077                  $oldctxid = $qcatmapping->info->contextid;
4078                  $newctxid = $qcatmapping->parentitemid;
4079  
4080                  $this->send_common_files($oldctxid, $newctxid, $progress);
4081                  $currentcatid = $categoryid;
4082              }
4083  
4084              $this->send_qtype_files($qtype, $oldctxid, $newctxid, $progress);
4085          }
4086          $catqtypes->close();
4087          $progress->end_progress();
4088      }
4089  
4090      /**
4091       * Send the common question files to a new context.
4092       *
4093       * @param int             $oldctxid Old context id.
4094       * @param int             $newctxid New context id.
4095       * @param \core\progress  $progress Progress object to use.
4096       */
4097      private function send_common_files($oldctxid, $newctxid, $progress) {
4098          // Add common question files (question and question_answer ones).
4099          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'questiontext',
4100                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_created', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4101          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'generalfeedback',
4102                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_created', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4103          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'answer',
4104                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_answer', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4105          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'answerfeedback',
4106                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_answer', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4107          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'hint',
4108                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_hint', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4109          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'correctfeedback',
4110                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_created', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4111          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'partiallycorrectfeedback',
4112                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_created', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4113          restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), 'question', 'incorrectfeedback',
4114                  $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), 'question_created', null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4115      }
4116  
4117      /**
4118       * Send the question type specific files to a new context.
4119       *
4120       * @param text            $qtype The qtype name to send.
4121       * @param int             $oldctxid Old context id.
4122       * @param int             $newctxid New context id.
4123       * @param \core\progress  $progress Progress object to use.
4124       */
4125      private function send_qtype_files($qtype, $oldctxid, $newctxid, $progress) {
4126          if (!isset($this->qtypecomponentscache[$qtype])) {
4127              $this->qtypecomponentscache[$qtype] = backup_qtype_plugin::get_components_and_fileareas($qtype);
4128          }
4129          $components = $this->qtypecomponentscache[$qtype];
4130          foreach ($components as $component => $fileareas) {
4131              foreach ($fileareas as $filearea => $mapping) {
4132                  restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool($this->get_basepath(), $this->get_restoreid(), $component, $filearea,
4133                          $oldctxid, $this->task->get_userid(), $mapping, null, $newctxid, true, $progress);
4134              }
4135          }
4136      }
4137  }
4138  
4139  /**
4140   * Try to restore aliases and references to external files.
4141   *
4142   * The queue of these files was prepared for us in {@link restore_dbops::send_files_to_pool()}.
4143   * We expect that all regular (non-alias) files have already been restored. Make sure
4144   * there is no restore step executed after this one that would call send_files_to_pool() again.
4145   *
4146   * You may notice we have hardcoded support for Server files, Legacy course files
4147   * and user Private files here at the moment. This could be eventually replaced with a set of
4148   * callbacks in the future if needed.
4149   *
4150   * @copyright 2012 David Mudrak <david@moodle.com>
4151   * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later
4152   */
4153  class restore_process_file_aliases_queue extends restore_execution_step {
4154  
4155      /** @var array internal cache for {@link choose_repository()} */
4156      private $cachereposbyid = array();
4157  
4158      /** @var array internal cache for {@link choose_repository()} */
4159      private $cachereposbytype = array();
4160  
4161      /**
4162       * What to do when this step is executed.
4163       */
4164      protected function define_execution() {
4165          global $DB;
4166  
4167          $this->log('processing file aliases queue', backup::LOG_DEBUG);
4168  
4169          $fs = get_file_storage();
4170  
4171          // Load the queue.
4172          $rs = $DB->get_recordset('backup_ids_temp',
4173              array('backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(), 'itemname' => 'file_aliases_queue'),
4174              '', 'info');
4175  
4176          // Iterate over aliases in the queue.
4177          foreach ($rs as $record) {
4178              $info = backup_controller_dbops::decode_backup_temp_info($record->info);
4179  
4180              // Try to pick a repository instance that should serve the alias.
4181              $repository = $this->choose_repository($info);
4182  
4183              if (is_null($repository)) {
4184                  $this->notify_failure($info, 'unable to find a matching repository instance');
4185                  continue;
4186              }
4187  
4188              if ($info->oldfile->repositorytype === 'local' or $info->oldfile->repositorytype === 'coursefiles') {
4189                  // Aliases to Server files and Legacy course files may refer to a file
4190                  // contained in the backup file or to some existing file (if we are on the
4191                  // same site).
4192                  try {
4193                      $reference = file_storage::unpack_reference($info->oldfile->reference);
4194                  } catch (Exception $e) {
4195                      $this->notify_failure($info, 'invalid reference field format');
4196                      continue;
4197                  }
4198  
4199                  // Let's see if the referred source file was also included in the backup.
4200                  $candidates = $DB->get_recordset('backup_files_temp', array(
4201                          'backupid' => $this->get_restoreid(),
4202                          'contextid' => $reference['contextid'],
4203                          'component' => $reference['component'],
4204                          'filearea' => $reference['filearea'],
4205                          'itemid' => $reference['itemid'],
4206                      ), '', 'info, newcontextid, newitemid');
4207  
4208                  $source = null;
4209  
4210                  foreach ($candidates as $candidate) {
4211                      $candidateinfo = backup_controller_dbops::decode_backup_temp_info($candidate->info);
4212                      if ($candidateinfo->filename === $reference['filename']
4213                              and $candidateinfo->filepath === $reference['filepath']
4214                              and !is_null($candidate->newcontextid)
4215                              and !is_null($candidate->newitemid) ) {
4216                          $source = $candidateinfo;
4217                          $source->contextid = $candidate->newcontextid;
4218                          $source->itemid = $candidate->newitemid;
4219                          break;
4220                      }
4221                  }
4222                  $candidates->close();
4223  
4224                  if ($source) {
4225                      // We have an alias that refers to another file also included in
4226                      // the backup. Let us change the reference field so that it refers
4227                      // to the restored copy of the original file.
4228                      $reference = file_storage::pack_reference($source);
4229  
4230                      // Send the new alias to the filepool.
4231                      $fs->create_file_from_reference($info->newfile, $repository->id, $reference);
4232                      $this->notify_success($info);
4233                      continue;
4234  
4235                  } else {
4236                      // This is a reference to some moodle file that was not contained in the backup
4237                      // file. If we are restoring to the same site, keep the reference untouched
4238                      // and restore the alias as is if the referenced file exists.
4239                      if ($this->task->is_samesite()) {
4240                          if ($fs->file_exists($reference['contextid'], $reference['component'], $reference['filearea'],
4241                                  $reference['itemid'], $reference['filepath'], $reference['filename'])) {
4242                              $reference = file_storage::pack_reference($reference);
4243                              $fs->create_file_from_reference($info->newfile, $repository->id, $reference);
4244                              $this->notify_success($info);
4245                              continue;
4246                          } else {
4247                              $this->notify_failure($info, 'referenced file not found');
4248                              continue;
4249                          }
4250  
4251                      // If we are at other site, we can't restore this alias.
4252                      } else {
4253                          $this->notify_failure($info, 'referenced file not included');
4254                          continue;
4255                      }
4256                  }
4257  
4258              } else if ($info->oldfile->repositorytype === 'user') {
4259                  if ($this->task->is_samesite()) {
4260                      // For aliases to user Private files at the same site, we have a chance to check
4261                      // if the referenced file still exists.
4262                      try {
4263                          $reference = file_storage::unpack_reference($info->oldfile->reference);
4264                      } catch (Exception $e) {
4265                          $this->notify_failure($info, 'invalid reference field format');
4266                          continue;
4267                      }
4268                      if ($fs->file_exists($reference['contextid'], $reference['component'], $reference['filearea'],
4269                              $reference['itemid'], $reference['filepath'], $reference['filename'])) {
4270                          $reference = file_storage::pack_reference($reference);
4271                          $fs->create_file_from_reference($info->newfile, $repository->id, $reference);
4272                          $this->notify_success($info);
4273                          continue;
4274                      } else {
4275                          $this->notify_failure($info, 'referenced file not found');
4276                          continue;
4277                      }
4278  
4279                  // If we are at other site, we can't restore this alias.
4280                  } else {
4281                      $this->notify_failure($info, 'restoring at another site');
4282                      continue;
4283                  }
4284  
4285              } else {
4286                  // This is a reference to some external file such as in boxnet or dropbox.
4287                  // If we are restoring to the same site, keep the reference untouched and
4288                  // restore the alias as is.
4289                  if ($this->task->is_samesite()) {
4290                      $fs->create_file_from_reference($info->newfile, $repository->id, $info->oldfile->reference);
4291                      $this->notify_success($info);
4292                      continue;
4293  
4294                  // If we are at other site, we can't restore this alias.
4295                  } else {
4296                      $this->notify_failure($info, 'restoring at another site');
4297                      continue;
4298                  }
4299              }
4300          }
4301          $rs->close();
4302      }
4303  
4304      /**
4305       * Choose the repository instance that should handle the alias.
4306       *
4307       * At the same site, we can rely on repository instance id and we just
4308       * check it still exists. On other site, try to find matching Server files or
4309       * Legacy course files repository instance. Return null if no matching
4310       * repository instance can be found.
4311       *
4312       * @param stdClass $info
4313       * @return repository|null
4314       */
4315      private function choose_repository(stdClass $info) {
4316          global $DB, $CFG;
4317          require_once($CFG->dirroot.'/repository/lib.php');
4318  
4319          if ($this->task->is_samesite()) {
4320              // We can rely on repository instance id.
4321  
4322              if (array_key_exists($info->oldfile->repositoryid, $this->cachereposbyid)) {
4323                  return $this->cachereposbyid[$info->oldfile->repositoryid];
4324              }
4325  
4326              $this->log('looking for repository instance by id', backup::LOG_DEBUG, $info->oldfile->repositoryid, 1);
4327  
4328              try {
4329                  $this->cachereposbyid[$info->oldfile->repositoryid] = repository::get_repository_by_id($info->oldfile->repositoryid, SYSCONTEXTID);
4330                  return $this->cachereposbyid[$info->oldfile->repositoryid];
4331              } catch (Exception $e) {
4332                  $this->cachereposbyid[$info->oldfile->repositoryid] = null;
4333                  return null;
4334              }
4335  
4336          } else {
4337              // We can rely on repository type only.
4338  
4339              if (empty($info->oldfile->repositorytype)) {
4340                  return null;
4341              }
4342  
4343              if (array_key_exists($info->oldfile->repositorytype, $this->cachereposbytype)) {
4344                  return $this->cachereposbytype[$info->oldfile->repositorytype];
4345              }
4346  
4347              $this->log('looking for repository instance by type', backup::LOG_DEBUG, $info->oldfile->repositorytype, 1);
4348  
4349              // Both Server files and Legacy course files repositories have a single
4350              // instance at the system context to use. Let us try to find it.
4351              if ($info->oldfile->repositorytype === 'local' or $info->oldfile->repositorytype === 'coursefiles') {
4352                  $sql = "SELECT ri.id
4353                            FROM {repository} r
4354                            JOIN {repository_instances} ri ON ri.typeid = r.id
4355                           WHERE r.type = ? AND ri.contextid = ?";
4356                  $ris = $DB->get_records_sql($sql, array($info->oldfile->repositorytype, SYSCONTEXTID));
4357                  if (empty($ris)) {
4358                      return null;
4359                  }
4360                  $repoids = array_keys($ris);
4361                  $repoid = reset($repoids);
4362                  try {
4363                      $this->cachereposbytype[$info->oldfile->repositorytype] = repository::get_repository_by_id($repoid, SYSCONTEXTID);
4364                      return $this->cachereposbytype[$info->oldfile->repositorytype];
4365                  } catch (Exception $e) {
4366                      $this->cachereposbytype[$info->oldfile->repositorytype] = null;
4367                      return null;
4368                  }
4369              }
4370  
4371              $this->cachereposbytype[$info->oldfile->repositorytype] = null;
4372              return null;
4373          }
4374      }
4375  
4376      /**
4377       * Let the user know that the given alias was successfully restored
4378       *
4379       * @param stdClass $info
4380       */
4381      private function notify_success(stdClass $info) {
4382          $filedesc = $this->describe_alias($info);
4383          $this->log('successfully restored alias', backup::LOG_DEBUG, $filedesc, 1);
4384      }
4385  
4386      /**
4387       * Let the user know that the given alias can't be restored
4388       *
4389       * @param stdClass $info
4390       * @param string $reason detailed reason to be logged
4391       */
4392      private function notify_failure(stdClass $info, $reason = '') {
4393          $filedesc = $this->describe_alias($info);
4394          if ($reason) {
4395              $reason = ' ('.$reason.')';
4396          }
4397          $this->log('unable to restore alias'.$reason, backup::LOG_WARNING, $filedesc, 1);
4398          $this->add_result_item('file_aliases_restore_failures', $filedesc);
4399      }
4400  
4401      /**
4402       * Return a human readable description of the alias file
4403       *
4404       * @param stdClass $info
4405       * @return string
4406       */
4407      private function describe_alias(stdClass $info) {
4408  
4409          $filedesc = $this->expected_alias_location($info->newfile);
4410  
4411          if (!is_null($info->oldfile->source)) {
4412              $filedesc .= ' ('.$info->oldfile->source.')';
4413          }
4414  
4415          return $filedesc;
4416      }
4417  
4418      /**
4419       * Return the expected location of a file
4420       *
4421       * Please note this may and may not work as a part of URL to pluginfile.php
4422       * (depends on how the given component/filearea deals with the itemid).
4423       *
4424       * @param stdClass $filerecord
4425       * @return string
4426       */
4427      private function expected_alias_location($filerecord) {
4428  
4429          $filedesc = '/'.$filerecord->contextid.'/'.$filerecord->component.'/'.$filerecord->filearea;
4430          if (!is_null($filerecord->itemid)) {
4431              $filedesc .= '/'.$filerecord->itemid;
4432          }
4433          $filedesc .= $filerecord->filepath.$filerecord->filename;
4434  
4435          return $filedesc;
4436      }
4437  
4438      /**
4439       * Append a value to the given resultset
4440       *
4441       * @param string $name name of the result containing a list of values
4442       * @param mixed $value value to add as another item in that result
4443       */
4444      private function add_result_item($name, $value) {
4445  
4446          $results = $this->task->get_results();
4447  
4448          if (isset($results[$name])) {
4449              if (!is_array($results[$name])) {
4450                  throw new coding_exception('Unable to append a result item into a non-array structure.');
4451              }
4452              $current = $results[$name];
4453              $current[] = $value;
4454              $this->task->add_result(array($name => $current));
4455  
4456          } else {
4457              $this->task->add_result(array($name => array($value)));
4458          }
4459      }
4460  }
4461  
4462  
4463  /**
4464   * Abstract structure step, to be used by all the activities using core questions stuff
4465   * (like the quiz module), to support qtype plugins, states and sessions
4466   */
4467  abstract class restore_questions_activity_structure_step extends restore_activity_structure_step {
4468      /** @var array question_attempt->id to qtype. */
4469      protected $qtypes = array();
4470      /** @var array question_attempt->id to questionid. */
4471      protected $newquestionids = array();
4472  
4473      /**
4474       * Attach below $element (usually attempts) the needed restore_path_elements
4475       * to restore question_usages and all they contain.
4476       *
4477       * If you use the $nameprefix parameter, then you will need to implement some
4478       * extra methods in your class, like
4479       *
4480       * protected function process_{nameprefix}question_attempt($data) {
4481       *     $this->restore_question_usage_worker($data, '{nameprefix}');
4482       * }
4483       * protected function process_{nameprefix}question_attempt($data) {
4484       *     $this->restore_question_attempt_worker($data, '{nameprefix}');
4485       * }
4486       * protected function process_{nameprefix}question_attempt_step($data) {
4487       *     $this->restore_question_attempt_step_worker($data, '{nameprefix}');
4488       * }
4489       *
4490       * @param restore_path_element $element the parent element that the usages are stored inside.
4491       * @param array $paths the paths array that is being built.
4492       * @param string $nameprefix should match the prefix passed to the corresponding
4493       *      backup_questions_activity_structure_step::add_question_usages call.
4494       */
4495      protected function add_question_usages($element, &$paths, $nameprefix = '') {
4496          // Check $element is restore_path_element
4497          if (! $element instanceof restore_path_element) {
4498              throw new restore_step_exception('element_must_be_restore_path_element', $element);
4499          }
4500  
4501          // Check $paths is one array
4502          if (!is_array($paths)) {
4503              throw new restore_step_exception('paths_must_be_array', $paths);
4504          }
4505          $paths[] = new restore_path_element($nameprefix . 'question_usage',
4506                  $element->get_path() . "/{$nameprefix}question_usage");
4507          $paths[] = new restore_path_element($nameprefix . 'question_attempt',
4508                  $element->get_path() . "/{$nameprefix}question_usage/{$nameprefix}question_attempts/{$nameprefix}question_attempt");
4509          $paths[] = new restore_path_element($nameprefix . 'question_attempt_step',
4510                  $element->get_path() . "/{$nameprefix}question_usage/{$nameprefix}question_attempts/{$nameprefix}question_attempt/{$nameprefix}steps/{$nameprefix}step",
4511                  true);
4512          $paths[] = new restore_path_element($nameprefix . 'question_attempt_step_data',
4513                  $element->get_path() . "/{$nameprefix}question_usage/{$nameprefix}question_attempts/{$nameprefix}question_attempt/{$nameprefix}steps/{$nameprefix}step/{$nameprefix}response/{$nameprefix}variable");
4514      }

4537      /**
4538       * This method does the acutal work for process_question_usage or
4539       * process_{nameprefix}_question_usage.
4540       * @param array $data the data from the XML file.
4541       * @param string $nameprefix the element name prefix.
4542       */
4543      protected function restore_question_usage_worker($data, $nameprefix) {
4544          global $DB;
4545  
4546          // Clear our caches.
4547          $this->qtypes = array();
4548          $this->newquestionids = array();
4549  
4550          $data = (object)$data;
4551          $oldid = $data->id;
4552  
4553          $oldcontextid = $this->get_task()->get_old_contextid();
4554          $data->contextid  = $this->get_mappingid('context', $this->task->get_old_contextid());
4555  
4556          // Everything ready, insert (no mapping needed)
4557          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question_usages', $data);
4558  
4559          $this->inform_new_usage_id($newitemid);
4560  
4561          $this->set_mapping($nameprefix . 'question_usage', $oldid, $newitemid, false);
4562      }

4565       * When process_question_usage creates the new usage, it calls this method
4566       * to let the activity link to the new usage. For example, the quiz uses
4567       * this method to set quiz_attempts.uniqueid to the new usage id.

4570      abstract protected function inform_new_usage_id($newusageid);

4572      /**
4573       * This method does the acutal work for process_question_attempt or
4574       * process_{nameprefix}_question_attempt.
4575       * @param array $data the data from the XML file.
4576       * @param string $nameprefix the element name prefix.
4577       */
4578      protected function restore_question_attempt_worker($data, $nameprefix) {
4579          global $DB;
4580  
4581          $data = (object)$data;
4582          $oldid = $data->id;
4583          $question = $this->get_mapping('question', $data->questionid);
4584  
4585          $data->questionusageid = $this->get_new_parentid($nameprefix . 'question_usage');
4586          $data->questionid      = $question->newitemid;
4587          if (!property_exists($data, 'variant')) {
4588              $data->variant = 1;
4589          }
4590          $data->timemodified    = $this->apply_date_offset($data->timemodified);
4591  
4592          if (!property_exists($data, 'maxfraction')) {
4593              $data->maxfraction = 1;
4594          }
4595  
4596          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question_attempts', $data);
4597  
4598          $this->set_mapping($nameprefix . 'question_attempt', $oldid, $newitemid);
4599          $this->qtypes[$newitemid] = $question->info->qtype;
4600          $this->newquestionids[$newitemid] = $data->questionid;
4601      }

4603      /**
4604       * This method does the acutal work for process_question_attempt_step or
4605       * process_{nameprefix}_question_attempt_step.
4606       * @param array $data the data from the XML file.
4607       * @param string $nameprefix the element name prefix.
4608       */
4609      protected function restore_question_attempt_step_worker($data, $nameprefix) {
4610          global $DB;
4611  
4612          $data = (object)$data;
4613          $oldid = $data->id;
4614  
4615          // Pull out the response data.
4616          $response = array();
4617          if (!empty($data->{$nameprefix . 'response'}[$nameprefix . 'variable'])) {
4618              foreach ($data->{$nameprefix . 'response'}[$nameprefix . 'variable'] as $variable) {
4619                  $response[$variable['name']] = $variable['value'];
4620              }
4621          }
4622          unset($data->response);
4623  
4624          $data->questionattemptid = $this->get_new_parentid($nameprefix . 'question_attempt');
4625          $data->timecreated = $this->apply_date_offset($data->timecreated);
4626          $data->userid      = $this->get_mappingid('user', $data->userid);
4627  
4628          // Everything ready, insert and create mapping (needed by question_sessions)
4629          $newitemid = $DB->insert_record('question_attempt_steps', $data);
4630          $this->set_mapping('question_attempt_step', $oldid, $newitemid, true);
4631  
4632          // Now process the response data.
4633          $response = $this->questions_recode_response_data(
4634                  $this->qtypes[$data->questionattemptid],
4635                  $this->newquestionids[$data->questionattemptid],
4636                  $data->sequencenumber, $response);
4637  
4638          foreach ($response as $name => $value) {
4639              $row = new stdClass();
4640              $row->attemptstepid = $newitemid;
4641              $row->name = $name;
4642              $row->value = $value;
4643              $DB->insert_record('question_attempt_step_data', $row, false);
4644          }
4645      }

4647      /**
4648       * Recode the respones data for a particular step of an attempt at at particular question.
4649       * @param string $qtype the question type.
4650       * @param int $newquestionid the question id.
4651       * @param int $sequencenumber the sequence number.
4652       * @param array $response the response data to recode.
4653       */
4654      public function questions_recode_response_data(
4655              $qtype, $newquestionid, $sequencenumber, array $response) {
4656          $qtyperestorer = $this->get_qtype_restorer($qtype);
4657          if ($qtyperestorer) {
4658              $response = $qtyperestorer->recode_response($newquestionid, $sequencenumber, $response);
4659          }
4660          return $response;
4661      }
4662  
4663      /**
4664       * Given a list of question->ids, separated by commas, returns the
4665       * recoded list, with all the restore question mappings applied.
4666       * Note: Used by quiz->questions and quiz_attempts->layout
4667       * Note: 0 = page break (unconverted)
4668       */
4669      protected function questions_recode_layout($layout) {
4670          // Extracts question id from sequence
4671          if ($questionids = explode(',', $layout)) {
4672              foreach ($questionids as $id => $questionid) {
4673                  if ($questionid) { // If it is zero then this is a pagebreak, don't translate
4674                      $newquestionid = $this->get_mappingid('question', $questionid);
4675                      $questionids[$id] = $newquestionid;
4676                  }
4677              }
4678          }
4679          return implode(',', $questionids);
4680      }
4681  
4682      /**
4683       * Get the restore_qtype_plugin subclass for a specific question type.
4684       * @param string $qtype e.g. multichoice.
4685       * @return restore_qtype_plugin instance.
4686       */
4687      protected function get_qtype_restorer($qtype) {
4688          // Build one static cache to store {@link restore_qtype_plugin}
4689          // while we are needing them, just to save zillions of instantiations
4690          // or using static stuff that will break our nice API
4691          static $qtypeplugins = array();
4692  
4693          if (!isset($qtypeplugins[$qtype])) {
4694              $classname = 'restore_qtype_' . $qtype . '_plugin';
4695              if (class_exists($classname)) {
4696                  $qtypeplugins[$qtype] = new $classname('qtype', $qtype, $this);
4697              } else {
4698                  $qtypeplugins[$qtype] = null;
4699              }
4700          }
4701          return $qtypeplugins[$qtype];
4702      }

4704      protected function after_execute() {
4705          parent::after_execute();
4706  
4707          // Restore any files belonging to responses.
4708          foreach (question_engine::get_all_response_file_areas() as $filearea) {
4709              $this->add_related_files('question', $filearea, 'question_attempt_step');
4710          }
4711      }
