4713      /**
4714       * Attach below $element (usually attempts) the needed restore_path_elements
4715       * to restore question attempt data from Moodle 2.0.
4716       *
4717       * When using this method, the parent element ($element) must be defined with
4718       * $grouped = true. Then, in that elements process method, you must call
4719       * {@link process_legacy_attempt_data()} with the groupded data. See, for
4720       * example, the usage of this method in {@link restore_quiz_activity_structure_step}.
4721       * @param restore_path_element $element the parent element. (E.g. a quiz attempt.)
4722       * @param array $paths the paths array that is being built to describe the
4723       *      structure.
4724       */
4725      protected function add_legacy_question_attempt_data($element, &$paths) {
4726          global $CFG;
4727          require_once($CFG->dirroot . '/question/engine/upgrade/upgradelib.php');
4728  
4729          // Check $element is restore_path_element
4730          if (!($element instanceof restore_path_element)) {
4731              throw new restore_step_exception('element_must_be_restore_path_element', $element);
4732          }
4733          // Check $paths is one array
4734          if (!is_array($paths)) {
4735              throw new restore_step_exception('paths_must_be_array', $paths);
4736          }
4737  
4738          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('question_state',
4739                  $element->get_path() . '/states/state');
4740          $paths[] = new restore_path_element('question_session',
4741                  $element->get_path() . '/sessions/session');
4742      }
4743  
4744      protected function get_attempt_upgrader() {
4745          if (empty($this->attemptupgrader)) {
4746              $this->attemptupgrader = new question_engine_attempt_upgrader();
4747              $this->attemptupgrader->prepare_to_restore();
4748          }
4749          return $this->attemptupgrader;
4750      }
4751  
4752      /**
4753       * Process the attempt data defined by {@link add_legacy_question_attempt_data()}.
4754       * @param object $data contains all the grouped attempt data to process.
4755       * @param pbject $quiz data about the activity the attempts belong to. Required
4756       * fields are (basically this only works for the quiz module):
4757       *      oldquestions => list of question ids in this activity - using old ids.
4758       *      preferredbehaviour => the behaviour to use for questionattempts.
4759       */
4760      protected function process_legacy_quiz_attempt_data($data, $quiz) {
4761          global $DB;
4762          $upgrader = $this->get_attempt_upgrader();
4763  
4764          $data = (object)$data;
4765  
4766          $layout = explode(',', $data->layout);
4767          $newlayout = $layout;
4768  
4769          // Convert each old question_session into a question_attempt.
4770          $qas = array();
4771          foreach (explode(',', $quiz->oldquestions) as $questionid) {
4772              if ($questionid == 0) {
4773                  continue;
4774              }
4775  
4776              $newquestionid = $this->get_mappingid('question', $questionid);
4777              if (!$newquestionid) {
4778                  throw new restore_step_exception('questionattemptreferstomissingquestion',
4779                          $questionid, $questionid);
4780              }
4781  
4782              $question = $upgrader->load_question($newquestionid, $quiz->id);
4783  
4784              foreach ($layout as $key => $qid) {
4785                  if ($qid == $questionid) {
4786                      $newlayout[$key] = $newquestionid;
4787                  }
4788              }
4789  
4790              list($qsession, $qstates) = $this->find_question_session_and_states(
4791                      $data, $questionid);
4792  
4793              if (empty($qsession) || empty($qstates)) {
4794                  throw new restore_step_exception('questionattemptdatamissing',
4795                          $questionid, $questionid);
4796              }
4797  
4798              list($qsession, $qstates) = $this->recode_legacy_response_data(
4799                      $question, $qsession, $qstates);
4800  
4801              $data->layout = implode(',', $newlayout);
4802              $qas[$newquestionid] = $upgrader->convert_question_attempt(
4803                      $quiz, $data, $question, $qsession, $qstates);
4804          }
4805  
4806          // Now create a new question_usage.
4807          $usage = new stdClass();
4808          $usage->component = 'mod_quiz';
4809          $usage->contextid = $this->get_mappingid('context', $this->task->get_old_contextid());
4810          $usage->preferredbehaviour = $quiz->preferredbehaviour;
4811          $usage->id = $DB->insert_record('question_usages', $usage);
4812  
4813          $this->inform_new_usage_id($usage->id);
4814  
4815          $data->uniqueid = $usage->id;
4816          $upgrader->save_usage($quiz->preferredbehaviour, $data, $qas,
4817                   $this->questions_recode_layout($quiz->oldquestions));
4818      }
4819  
4820      protected function find_question_session_and_states($data, $questionid) {
4821          $qsession = null;
4822          foreach ($data->sessions['session'] as $session) {
4823              if ($session['questionid'] == $questionid) {
4824                  $qsession = (object) $session;
4825                  break;
4826              }
4827          }
4828  
4829          $qstates = array();
4830          foreach ($data->states['state'] as $state) {
4831              if ($state['question'] == $questionid) {
4832                  // It would be natural to use $state['seq_number'] as the array-key
4833                  // here, but it seems that buggy behaviour in 2.0 and early can
4834                  // mean that that is not unique, so we use id, which is guaranteed
4835                  // to be unique.
4836                  $qstates[$state['id']] = (object) $state;
4837              }
4838          }
4839          ksort($qstates);
4840          $qstates = array_values($qstates);
4841  
4842          return array($qsession, $qstates);
4843      }
4844  
4845      /**
4846       * Recode any ids in the response data
4847       * @param object $question the question data
4848       * @param object $qsession the question sessions.
4849       * @param array $qstates the question states.
4850       */
4851      protected function recode_legacy_response_data($question, $qsession, $qstates) {
4852          $qsession->questionid = $question->id;
4853  
4854          foreach ($qstates as &$state) {
4855              $state->question = $question->id;
4856              $state->answer = $this->restore_recode_legacy_answer($state, $question->qtype);
4857          }
4858  
4859          return array($qsession, $qstates);
4860      }
4861  
4862      /**
4863       * Recode the legacy answer field.
4864       * @param object $state the state to recode the answer of.
4865       * @param string $qtype the question type.
4866       */
4867      public function restore_recode_legacy_answer($state, $qtype) {
4868          $restorer = $this->get_qtype_restorer($qtype);
4869          if ($restorer) {
4870              return $restorer->recode_legacy_state_answer($state);
4871          } else {
4872              return $state->answer;
4873          }
4874      }
